name: sohojnotes-monorepo
description: সহজNotes - A comprehensive note-taking and sharing platform

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf frontend/.next frontend/dist backend/dist node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
